jobDescription: CB4 Responsibilities: · Liaison between hospital departments as a resource for the Behavioral Health Unit for mental health assessments in the hospital.  · Provide professional evaluation and triage of patients.  · Evaluate and coordinate psychiatric intakes and referrals.  · Recruit, train and manage the Intake Navigator on-call team and coverage schedule. Requirements: · Graduate from an accredited Masters' Degree Program in Social Work or Clinical Psychology.  · Current License and in good standing in the State of Michigan in respective discipline (Fully Licensed Masters in Social Work or Licensed Psychologist) · Two years' experience working in a mental health treatment setting that includes diagnostic assessments, crisis screening, and psychosocial assessments.  · Basic computer, data entry, typing, filing and organization skills required.  · Must have excellent verbal and written communication skills.
